price: 如果你们不带他来见我，你们就不能从我这里购买一颗粮食，你们也不得临近我。”
arabic: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَأۡتُونِي بِهِۦ فَلَا كَيۡلَ لَكُمۡ عِندِي وَلَا تَقۡرَبُونِ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: fa-in lam tatūnī bihi falā kayla lakum ʿindī walā taqrabūni
